post.body: I imagine u are trying 2 get PoP 2 regroup so that u can sign them up w/ Magnatune. They would be a fine addition 2 ur label :-)
some companies overlook not only obvious, but even cheapest approach to building brand - through one-on-one viral relationships
Hooray!!!!! Congrats on the new job. I know you were really hoping to get it. No more housecleaning gigs for you!
Hang in there, Rich. Relief is instantaneous the moment you go to bed on the eve of a holiday hiatus. Keep your eye on the prize!
I had no idea there was 10 tweet signal. Twitter's way of telling us not to circumvent sound byte purpose of the program? LOL
I wish cleaning was only reptilian, then executive brain functions wouldn't take over & "demand" extra sensory appeals lol
conditioning factors may alter basic human responses to stimuli, but there is lag time during which brain stem might prevail
yes, real world has more sensory input, but must still pass through brain stem to generate response to stimuli
Brain stem function is key in attention, arousal & consciousness. All survival info passes to or from before being mediated
(re: dancing w/ dog) She did chew the radio, but Abba kept playing. They were sent by the devil to plague us for all eternity :-)
Sunny outside but not inside? Time to get off the lonely mountain (beautiful as it is) and go where life is more stimulating.
Boomers still in control (for better or worse) :-) "Do not go gentle into that good night..." http://www.bigeye.com/donotgo.htm
Received first holiday present today. It was from a client. Very sweet, thoughtful, and unexpected. I guess the holiday season has arrived !
A music video I just love to hate. So bad, it's funny! RT http://ping.fm/6lcyf Thx @WebSocialMedia and @Akivafever
Getting ready to go to usual Friday night volunteer shift at counseling center. Looks like rain has stopped - I can bike rather than drive.
Reading Culture of Narcissism (Lasch), Lonely Crowd (Reisman), Mind, Self & Society (Mead) & Linked (Barabasi).
Made new sweaters out of my old sweaters for 14 year old pit bull, Louis. He is looking very dapper and is nice and warm now.
Spent hour w/ elderly neighbor -she recalled life as a nurse in German army during WW2, detention in Denmark, immigration to US-fascinating!
Love having time to do those pesky little time-draining tasks that I have been putting off, like shopping for new phone/Internet service
OK enough puppy love...time to get back to the to-do list. Let's see...go on and on about puppies. Check!
...& puppy Sophia's joyful personality is emerging after whatever hell she went through w/ her prior owners. She is so loyal & affectionate.
Puppy Maggie's beautiful emerald green eyes have taken on a green/amber color w/ age. She is 8 mos old & over 50lbs.
Gray, drizzly, chilly in Philly this a.m...but I am on fire! A loaded to-do list that I am barreling through. Let's see - Twitter? Check!
....that is, viral Social Media relationships
If company is on Twitter & does not engage at human level, I quickly unfollow. In fact, I will not follow at all if tweets are all promos
SM as marketing tool is best when personal relationship formed first. Put relationship before product. I will buy from u if I think I know u
RT For your holiday listening pleasure http://www.useurl.us/2mc Hilarious rendering by Indiana U men's a cappella chorus Thx@michaelBuchanan
Hmmm....I am in all three trustful & marriageable categories (doctor,educator, techie), yet I remain single. :-)
RT @guykawasaki Where you sit on a bus can define your personality http://ow.ly/283. Also check out his amazing site http://alltop.com/
Creating business math syllabus & psychology syllabus - will be teaching both in the business and social sciences departments of the college
Should I continue tweets on brain functions or go back to subjects about puppies and housecleaning :-) lol
Is this my first Twitter mini seminar? :-)
Joni Mitchell lulled puppies into sleep - four dogs piled up on one another. I am tempted to crawl in to fur pile with them - looks so comfy
Background music this morning: Joni Mitchell's CDs "Turbulent Indigo", which followed "Night Ride Home"
Profound continued: It is only intercession of "evolved" part of brain that differentiates between real & not, but is not always successful
Profound: the primitive part of our brains perceives all images to be real. It does not differentiate between cartoons, movies, & real life
Mundane: Breakfast = toasted black bean patties topped with olive salsa, steamed veggies with kofta curry, and water.
Off to great start this morning. Looking forward to teaching new classes starting tomorrow. Also, new clients on hold waiting for an opening
Went to chastise Maggie. Abba "Dancing Queen" on radio. Started dancing w/ Maggie instead. I just reinforced bad behavior. Sigh
Maggie chewing something in other room. It sounds like it might be couch leg. At 55 lbs, puppy has moved on from rugs to large furniture
